scripts.start: eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i src/styles/main.css -c src/styles/tailwind.config.js -o dist/main.css --watch
scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i src/styles/main.css -c src/styles/tailwind.config.js -o dist/main.css --minify
